name: FlexWash
headline: The operating system for the car wash industry.
description: Car washing is a $15B market in dire need of disruption. Legacy systems are costly, out of date, and inflexible. We are building modern solutions to help car wash operators manage and grow their business.

founders.name: Karan Toor, Founder
founders.description: Been writing B2B SaaS software for over a decade, noticed car wash software was especially behind. Interested in math puzzles and economics.

founders.name: Chirag Toor, Founder
founders.description: I'm a co-founder of FlexWash. I've been writing software for over 10 years and running my family car wash with my brother for 4 years. We ran into several pain points trying to run our car wash with existing solutions, so we built our own.

Next Gen Car Wash POS + CRM
[Book Demo](https://www.flexwashtech.com/<https:/www.flexwashtech.com>)
[2k Members in 1 Month!](https://www.flexwashtech.com/<https:/www.flexwashtech.com>)
[How it works?](https://www.flexwashtech.com/<https:/www.flexwashtech.com/car-wash-pos>)
Built-in CRM to track every customer
Assisted Upselling based on wash history
Employee level sales tracking
State-of-the-Art Integrations
## Track every vehicle
Imagine being able to offer your grand opening special to every new customer individually. With a built in CRM you can. Even customize the pitch!
![FlexWash uses the PAX A920 Pro tablet to deliver a handheld point of sale.](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/47a23a_39eb5d57746f4555be6d8c22cf533b30~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_357,h_783,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Pax-A920-Tablet-for-car-wash-pos_edited_.png)
![FlexWash uses your customer's wash history to built upsell flows that deliver your custom pitch and offer per customer.](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/47a23a_bb305a718c6144b59014049e6b30eeb4~mv2.gif)
![Car Wash](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_fc5fcf03b8c546298f70d075e6564eed~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_147,h_98,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/11062b_fc5fcf03b8c546298f70d075e6564eed~mv2.jpg)
## Proven Success
See how Glide XPRESS was able to use our built-in CRM to double conversion rates and sell 2,000 memberships in just 1 month!
[Download Case Study](https://www.flexwashtech.com/<https:/www.flexwashtech.com/_files/ugd/47a23a_99dab80721c34c6a9fbef3d6459657c0.pdf>)
![custumer-success-case-study-glide-POS](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/47a23a_661b9c88066a4915b5c7b10f042af047~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_60,h_51,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/47a23a_661b9c88066a4915b5c7b10f042af047~mv2.png)
## Features
### Advanced LPR
Using the latest AI Technology to track and read license plates. We provide a transparent report to prove read rates and measure throughput.
### Track every vehicle
Automatically track every member and non member. Record every customers wash history and use that in upsell campaigns.
### Boost Memberships
With our assisted upselling module offers and pitches can be customized. Track every employee's sales and optimize schedules.
### Marketing ROI Reports
True ROI numbers by tracking spend of each customer post coupon redemption. Know which channels are worth investing in.
![Car-wash-analytics-flexwash-POS](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/47a23a_5b351bf5746c46eca53bd6fa3ec52a2f~mv2.gif/v1/fill/w_144,h_82,al_c,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,pstr/47a23a_5b351bf5746c46eca53bd6fa3ec52a2f~mv2_gif.gif)
## Client Testimonials
> “By combining the POS and CRM we get to capture the entire customer lifecycle and optimize every level of our operation to funnel them into a membership.”
![Shawn Peterson from Glide Express is a big believer in FlexWash and has seen the results first hand.](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/47a23a_48781c5b9be24243bbd5260fb5d3e78a~mv2.jpeg/v1/fill/w_60,h_60,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/shawn.jpeg)
Shawn Peterson
VP, Glide XPRESS
> “FlexWash's SpotAI integration saves my team over 20 hours a week. Investigating operational issues is just a one click function.”
![Glide Express is a FlexWash customer and uses the POS and CRM to boost their memberships.](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/47a23a_d83f2b090a234118a6e6cdbe71a7828c~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_60,h_60,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/glideLogo.png)
Heath Owsley
Director of Ops, Glide XPRESS
> “Tracking sales % by employee is a game changer. I'm able to focus on who needs more training and ensure our best sellers are scheduled on our busiest days.”
![Express Auto Spa is a FlexWash customer and uses the POS and CRM to boost their memberships.](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/47a23a_c4811198ce174865b9066c619f33f6c3~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_60,h_60,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/logo_edited.jpg)
Adrian Lopez
Manager, Express Auto Spa

generated_description:
FlexWash is a burgeoning startup that’s taken a hard look at the car wash industry, a $15 billion market that’s ripe for innovation. Founded in 2021 and currently part of Y Combinator’s W23 batch, this company is based in Temecula, California. FlexWash aims to modernize a sector that has long relied on outdated and rigid legacy systems that lean heavily on manual processes and limited flexibility.

The mission? To create "the operating system for the car wash industry." This isn’t just a catchy tagline—FlexWash is building tools that empower car wash operators to efficiently manage and grow their businesses. With a small but dedicated team of two, they’re focused on delivering cutting-edge software solutions that include a point-of-sale (POS) system, customer relationship management (CRM) tools, and advanced marketing features. 

So, what’s under the hood? FlexWash’s platform includes several standout features:
- **Chick-fil-A Inspired Approach**: A service model aimed at elevating customer experience.
- **License Plate Recognition (LPR)**: Utilizes AI technology to streamline operations by tracking and reading vehicle plates.
- **Comprehensive Reporting**: Offers insights into car wash reporting that help operators understand their performance metrics.
- **Built-in CRM**: Designed to track every customer interaction and boost upselling opportunities by using customer wash histories.

Customer feedback underscores FlexWash’s effectiveness. For example, clients like Glide XPRESS have seen a dramatic increase in memberships by leveraging the built-in CRM to optimize their sales processes, leading to record conversions in just a month.

Ultimately, FlexWash is not just another SaaS solution; it’s a thoughtful, integrated approach to reshaping how car wash businesses operate—making them more efficient, customer-friendly, and adaptable in a fast-changing market. With strong backing and innovative offerings, they’re carving out a promising niche in a sector that’s crying out for disruption.

For more information, check out their website at [FlexWash](https://www.flexwashtech.com/).
